title: Really pissed. Please any riot member??
body: I wanted to buy rp during the bonus rp and get the diana on sale. But as you see, I am unable to do either as the client won't download. I have also missed a week of first win. This is really pissing. Please extend the sales or fix your game{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
:O

Really sorry to hear about this **iiLuvBears**!  While I can't extend the sale, I can at least provide some help in resolving the problem you have.  To that end, could you reply back and explain in-depth the store issues your seeing?

Looking forward to your response!

i have changed dns and flushed and also installed hotspot shield. However, i think hotspot shield is preventing the installation of league and it goes super slow even though my internet is fine. But, if i off hotspot shield, I am unable to enter the game as i have unspecified error and check logs for more information.

Given the error your receiving, make sure that you go through our [Connection Issues Knowledge Base Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has quite a number of steps, but they are crucial in helping solve this issue.  Confirm that every single one is completed!

If you are still having issues with getting past these errors, regardless of the steps, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to get this resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
i am unable to enter the 3 websites

Hey **iiLuvBears**,

Let's try to work out this problem. I know you've been on the boards trying out different solutions, so let's start there.

What are the symptoms you're having, and what solutions have you tried so far?
Whoa. A wrench. Either you're one of the same two I came across before, or a 3rd new one. Don't recognize the name. Must be the 3rd new one.

We ain't dyin' yet! 

{{champion:104}}
idk, you're still near extinction. {{champion:121}}

Heh, I'm the newest Junior Wrenchman (as of last night) ^_^ I've been pretty active on these boards though, but now I'm orange! The other two Wrenchmen that you may have seen are **Eambo **and **Elduris**. Pleasure to meet you :D

i have changed dns and flushed and also installed hotspot shield. However, i think hotspot shield is preventing the installation of league and it goes super slow even though my internet is fine. But, if i off hotspot shield, I am unable to enter the game as i have unspecified error and check logs for more information.

Can you perform an nslookup for support.riotgames.com and post the output here?

> Open Command Prompt
Use the command "nslookup support.riotgames.com"

Server:		8.8.4.4
Address:	8.8.4.4#53

** server can't find support.riotgames.com: NXDOMAIN

and i am still having the unspecified error. Thanks so much for the help I received and the effort you guys put into fixing your game. I just missed the diana sale and most likely the rp bonus. FUCK!!!
If you disable hotspot shield, can you access the support site?
Nope.But I am on the right DNS. Wasnt it supposed to have been solved 6 days ago? according to eambo
Clear your browser's cache if you haven't already. If an older, non-working version is being loaded, clearing the cache will send a fresh request.
Running a mac here
Even Mac browsers have caches!
i have cleared caches. still unable to enter both game and websites

What happens if you reset your network entirely? On your router should be a little pinhole, commonly near the back. Hold that button in for 30 seconds and your settings will return to default. See if you can access the support site then.
ok ty. What about the dns issues? when will they be fixed?
Here
Here you are
That's up to your ISP/whoever manages the DNS you're using.

Ah, okay.

Elduris
Eambo
Wuks

3 Wrenchmen are still struggling to stay alive. I'm keeping track of this. Close to extinction. Watch out for that meteor.
+1 Let's welcome KaoAtlantis to the North America Wrenchmen team!

Snap. +1 indeed.

Elduris
Eambo
Wuks
KaoAtlantis

Welcome, Kao.
